site_name: 229-255 And 277-279 Kingston Road  New MaldenKT3 3SW
decision_conditions: No communal amenity space shall be restricted on the grounds of the tenure of the accommodation.Reason: In the interests of the amenities of the future occupants and to ensure that the development creates the space for mixed and balanced communities to be created.

The development shall be carried out and operated in accordance with the Amenity Space Management Plan hereby approved.Reason: In the interests of the amenities of the future occupants and to ensure that the development creates the space for mixed and balanced communities to be created.
description: Details required for Condition 22 (Amenity Space Management Plan) of planning permission 19/01228/FUL (Redevelopment of the site to provide 297 residential units in buildings ranging from 4 to 7 storeys, with 207 sq m commercial space (A1, A2, A3, A4, B1 and D1) at ground floor, 123 car parking spaces (including car club and accessible provision); communal landscaped amenity areas, secure cycle parking, stopping up of Avenue Terrace and other associated development)
